an5.112:3.1: 112 An Ascetic to Follow Behind on Almsround
an5.112:4.1: “Mendicants, you shouldn’t take an ascetic to follow behind on almsround with five qualities.
an5.112:4.3: They walk too far away or too close behind. They don’t take your bowl when it’s full. They don’t warn you when your speech is bordering on an offense. They keep on interrupting while you’re speaking. And they’re witless, dull, and stupid.
an5.112:4.4: You shouldn’t take an ascetic to follow behind on almsround with these five qualities.
an5.112:5.1: You should take an ascetic to follow behind on almsround with five qualities.
an5.112:5.3: They don’t walk too far away or too close behind. They take your bowl when it is full. They warn you when your speech is bordering on an offense. They don’t interrupt while you’re speaking. And they’re wise, bright, and clever.
an5.112:5.4: You should take an ascetic to follow behind on almsround with these five qualities.”
